pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Asynchronous Component Base[![Code style: crackerjack](https://img.shields.io/badge/code%20style-crackerjack-000042)](https://github.com/lesleslie/crackerjack)Asynchronous Component Base, or 'acb', is a collection of modularcomponents (actions / adapters) that provide the building blocks for rapid,asynchronous, application development.This codebase should be considered alpha right now as it is underheavy development. A majority of the components are currently being back-ported fromother apps and may not currently work as intended.More documentation is on the way!## Installation```pdm add acb```## Actions### Encode```from acb.actions.encode import loadload.json(obj)```### Hash```from acb.actions.hash import hashhash.blake2b(obj)```## Configuration```from acb.config import ( Config, Settings,)```## Logging```from acb.adapters.logger import Logger```## Adapters## Acknowledgements## LicenseBSD-3-Clause
